task.title: Installing from an .xdx file
task.shortdesc: Using a .xdx file, you can download and install the plugin from any source without it being available in the plugin manager. This can be useful for prerelease or customized versions of the plugin.

context.note: Only install plugins from sources you trust. Anyone can package a .xdx file with possibly malicious content, as, when distributed outside the plugin manager, they don't have to undergo any review.

step.cmd: Right-click the .xdx file and click Open with Adobe XD .
step.stepresult: XD opens and asks whether you want to install the plugin.
A window opens to inform you that the plugin is now installed.

taskbody.result: The plugin is now installed and ready to use.
taskbody.tasktroubleshooting: If you receive an error about the plugin being already installed, uninstall the earlier version first by following the procedure.
